DOC.brief_summary: Pharmacokinetic study in healthy subjects with single and repeat b.i.d. dosing of PN 400 tablets from the same drug product batch.
DOC.brief_title: PK Study to Evaluate Esomeprazole Plasma Levels Following Administration of PN 400
DOC.criteria: Healthy male or nonpregnant female subjects between 1855 years of age as well as other standard inclusion criteria for a study of this nature Standard inclusion criteria for a study of this nature
